# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
/package(?:-lock|)\.json$
/pinyindb/
/settings-html/
ignore$
[/.][a-z]{2}(?:-[a-zA-Z]{2}|)\.
\.ai$
\.bmp$
\.dat$
\.dll$
\.gif$
\.gitignore$
\.ico$
\.jpg$
\.lcl$
\.lock$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.pdf$
\.png$
\.PNG$
\.woff$
\.zip$
^\.github/
^\.github/actions/spell-check/
